entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
